title: IntegrationStatusUpdate — Northstar / Riverbend — Closing — 2025-10-24
all_text:
INTEGRATION STATUS UPDATE — WEEK 10 (INTERNAL)
Date: 2025-10-24
Stage: Closing

Workstreams:
1) Product & Engineering
- Firmware repo migration: blocked
- Telemetry integration: in progress

2) IT / Security
- SSO rollout: planned
- Log centralization: in progress

3) Commercial
- Bundle pricing: approved
- Top-customer outreach: complete

4) People
- Role mapping: underway
- Retention offers: accepted

Issues / risks:
- Security note: one phishing incident last year; remediation appears adequate but evidence
is partial.

Next week focus:
- Close remaining data room gaps
